blocks.title: Blocks
blocks.explanation: In each block, the numbers from 1 to the size of the board must appear exactly once. Blocks that do not match the size of the board will be ignored.

oddEven.title: Odd/Even
oddEven.explanation: Numbers in cells with circles must be odd. Numbers in cells with squares must be even.

nonConsecutive.title: Non-Consecutive
nonConsecutive.explanation: Numbers in adjacent cells cannot differ by 1.

xv.title: XV Sudoku
xv.explanation: Adjacent cells with numbers summing 10 are marked with X. Adjacent cells with numbers summing 5 are marked with V. If there is no marker, the sum of the numbers is not 5 or 10.
